00038 #ifdef __IEEE_BIG_ENDIAN /* From machine/ieeefp.h */
00039 #define Swap32IfBigEndian(_u) { _u = (_u << 32) | (_u >> 32); }
00040 #else
00041 #define Swap32IfBigEndian(_) {}

00044 #include "std.h"
00045 #include "dl_protocol.h"
00046 
00048 #define PPRZ 1
00049 #define XBEE 2
00050 
00051 EXTERN bool_t dl_msg_available;
00054 EXTERN uint16_t datalink_time;
00055 
00056 #define MSG_SIZE 128
00057 EXTERN uint8_t dl_buffer[MSG_SIZE]  __attribute__ ((aligned));
00058 
00059 EXTERN void dl_parse_msg(void);
00062 #if DATALINK == PPRZ
00063 
00064 #define DatalinkEvent() {     \
00065   if (PprzBuffer()) {       \
00066     ReadPprzBuffer();       \
00067     if (pprz_msg_received) {      \
00068       pprz_parse_payload();     \
00069       pprz_msg_received = FALSE;    \
00070     }           \
00071   }           \
00072   if (dl_msg_available) {     \
00073     dl_parse_msg();       \
00074     dl_msg_available = FALSE;     \
00075   }           \
00076 }
00077 
00078 #elif DATALINK == XBEE
00079 
00080 #define DatalinkEvent() {     \
00081   if (XBeeBuffer()) {       \
00082     ReadXBeeBuffer();       \
00083     if (xbee_msg_received) {      \
00084       xbee_parse_payload();     \
00085       xbee_msg_received = FALSE;    \
00086     }           \
00087   }           \
00088   if (dl_msg_available) {     \
00089     dl_parse_msg();       \
00090     dl_msg_available = FALSE;     \
00091   }           \
00092 }
00093 
00094 #else
00095 
00096 // Unknown DATALINK
00097 #define DatalinkEvent() {}
00098 
00099 #endif /* DATALINK == */
00100 
00101 #endif /* DATALINK_H */
